sentences.en: When the planetarium sky matched the sky outside, the birds fluttered in the direction of their normal migration.
sentences.cn: 当天文馆的天空与外面的天空相匹配时，鸟儿们就朝着它们正常迁徙的方向飞翔。

sentences.en: To test the idea, caged night-migrating birds were placed on the floor of a planetarium during their migratory period.
sentences.cn: 为了验证这个想法，这些在夜晚迁徙的候鸟被关进笼子里，并且在它们的迁徙期间被放置在一个天文馆的地面上。

sentences.en: The ceiling was done up planetarium style — a black sky with star constellations.
sentences.cn: 天花板属于天象仪风格，黑色的天穹上点缀着星座。
